s.text: Bradley says Clinton was wrong to grant clemency to Puerto Rican criminals, and he argues that the apparent success of Clinton's welfare reform is due largely to the strong economy.
Bradley says Clinton was wrong to grant clemency to Puerto Rican criminals, and he argues that the apparent success of Clinton's welfare reform is due largely to the strong economy.

("That giant sucking sound you hear is the sound of the Republican Party sucking up to Buchanan," quips McLaughlin's Eleanor Clift.)
("That giant sucking sound you hear is the sound of the Republican Party sucking up to Buchanan," quips McLaughlin's Eleanor Clift.)
Most programs flash polls showing Bradley even with Gore in New Hampshire and New York.
Most programs flash polls showing Bradley even with Gore in New Hampshire and New York.
Appearing on CBS's Face the Nation , Pat Buchanan says nothing new but sounds more bitter than ever.

Several panelists--including Bill Kristol ( This Week ) , Gloria Borger ( Face the Nation and PBS's Washington Week in Review ), Alan Murray ( Washington Week ), and Jack Germond (NBC's Meet the Press )--think the GOP should show Buchanan the door.
When Tim Russert asks him whether his upcoming meeting with Buchanan will be at Buchanan's office or his own, he stutters and then refuses to answer.
